entry.title: Widget
entry.content:
Many of the projects I have worked on had "widgety" elements to them, for example the social media ones.

The only project so far which consisted of nothing but widgets was for the Logica Intranet. The widgets were built in JQuery.

entry.title: Portfolio
entry.content: I have worked on at least six versions of my portfolio site, plus a few others for friends and friends of friends.

entry.title: Ambient Media
entry.content: Besides the showreels de rigueur in media agencies, and a pitch for Emirates for which I built the prototype, I have worked on a single ambient media project so far, basically an outdoor screen reacting to data fetched remotely as XML.

entry.title: Kiosks
entry.content:
I haven't dont much work on kiosks, but as they aren't fundamentally different from other digital devices.

The Ford Presentation tool was taken on a tour by Ford, and used to train sales staff. I built the backend for it.

The Orange Kiosk was quite a larger and complex project which allowed users in Orange shops to browse the catalogue. I only played a minor role in that project.

entry.title: Website templates
entry.content:
The PEBL Colours project was a bit more than just a templating job - We were setting standards and procedures for the whole Motorola online activities in Europe. The project involved a lot of usability testing, client meetings, and communication with different European offices.

For the remaining jobs, I was hired because the agencies involved needed to pass on templates to another company. They wanted an expert to make sure the work was done to a high standard and made them look good.
